name: World Evolution
description:
Run, jump, collect DNA strands and evolve.

  Plunge into the primitive world where every crawling, flying or running creature wants to snatch a piece from you.  Arm yourself with primitive weapons, crush and kill annoying beetles, throw stones at animals and birds.

 40 levels full of dangerous challenges and interesting puzzles await you, great controls like in classic platformers and great music.

  Complete levels, collect coins, unlock new characters.  Upon completion of each level, you will be rewarded with interesting facts about human evolution.

 Join the most interesting adventure with the Evolution of the World.  Survive in this cruel world, collect all the skins and Evolve.
